plot: Mister Rogers goes to a conservatory to see different plants growing there. He plants a bean seed and reminds children that even though we can't see it, all living things grow. In Make-Believe, the neighbors wonder about the "Big Thing."
title: MisteRogers' Neighborhood" Episode #1991.1632
plot_es: Mister Rogers goes to a conservatory to see different plants growing there. He plants a bean seed and reminds children that even though we can't see it, all living things grow. In Make-Believe, the neighbors wonder about the "Big Thing."
